entry.summary: ...Chinook Warming Pattern This Weekend Through Early Next Week... entry.cap:areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Slick roads possible through the Thursday morning commute... Slick surfaces are possible as a much colder air mass settles across this morning. Expect decreasing temperatures through the morning. Icy surfaces and road conditions are possible, especially along untreated surfaces. Slow down and allow plenty of extra space between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
